getUiDevice().Description: Get current instance of @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice_E@. Works similar to calling the static @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice#getInstance_E@ from anywhere in the test classes.

getParams().Description: Get command line parameters. On the command line when passing -e key value pairs, the @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ will have the key value pairs conveniently available to the tests.

getAutomationSupport().Description: Use @B_android#app#Instrumentation#sendStatus_E@ instead Provides support for running tests to report interim status

ClassDesc: It is no longer necessary to extend UiAutomatorTestCase. You can use @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice#getInstance_E@ from any test class as long as you have access to an https:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#Instrumentation_E@ instance. UI Automator test case that is executed on the device.
